block.name: Fast Autocor
block.doc:
/home/tom/.grc_gnuradio/fast_autocor.py Fast autocorrelation. fft_size is the block size to compute the fft. It must be an integer power of 2 (256, 512, 1024, 2048, etc.).
The output is a time series, mirrored around fft_size/2. Set the time output display device for zero to fft_size/2.
